subject: A Pleasure, stamina, and erection power enhancer with NO side effects. I felt a distinct difference not only in my stamina, also in my ability to concentrate for longer periods.
body:
Having impotence for 5 years, and having unsuccessful results with viagra or cialis, im so glad i discovered Vigramax Usually you would place 2 of the mint flavoured pills under the tongue, and let them disolve. You can also swallow the pills if you prefer, however the effects may take 1 hour or longer to take effect.
http://kiddokid.com
Vigramax is a 100% natural formula, that comes in mouth disolving softtabs, of which 2 are to be taken 30 minutes before sexual activity, for guaranteed erections.
